Extended Tetris

Jan 14, 2010 Taking pieces beyond x and y shifts

First person tetris, what a trip (thanks Assaf). I’m glad I do not have to rotate my world around in order to put something on a shelf. Playing it got me thinking, though. The thought was, “What would the pieces look like if the individual blocks were not forced to meet along their edges?” As in, what if the blocks could meet at their corners.

Whelp, here’s how. I might be missing a few, but whatever. That would be one hell of game.
